title: Climate Change - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/28/22
itunes:title: Climate Change - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/28/22
description:
George Noory and author Jerome Corsi explore his research into global warming and climate change, and how he believes disinformation is being spread to manipulate the public into supporting bad environmental policies.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
